channel.title: Perplexity
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER]Our website has been released: *
[IMG]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/4451/logorr.png[/img]
[U]Dev. team:[/U]
Project starter; - Potstyle
Project co-starter; - Smudge
Web dev. team; - Smudge - Anthony` - Matt` - Toonshorty
Coder(s); - Toonshorty - Emperor - SiniSoul (Currently Away, Will return soon) - stacx
Other helpers/Video editors; - Glen`(Helper) - !Realize (Helper)
[B]Revision 614[/B]
We will not be based on PKing, we will not be based on Skilling, no we'll be based on BOTH of them!
[B]What are we aiming for?[/B]
- A good/stable economy. - Playing = fun. - Not accepting boredom; theres always something to do! - Good gameplay; you will not see 200 different types of customs on the game, we are talking about a decent RSPS not about CustomScapeSkillingPkz (I've made this name up, if anyone his RSPS is called like this, I'm sorry). - A good staff base (no abusers), which you'll have to earn (you can't pay for it), - A non-donator whore based server, donators are equal to regular players (we will treat you equally), though they'll receive some more possibility's ingame. - We will advertise on a formal way, we will not spam other servers with 'Come join Perplexity you'll get free pancakes'. - A decent website, not a regular forum.
[B]Some screenshots, for more visit our site;[/B] [IMG]http://i343.photobucket.com/albums/o463/mit03_photos/Perplexity-DescentofDarkness1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i343.photobucket.com/albums/o463/mit03_photos/Perplexity-DescentofDarkness2.jpg[/img]
[B]Do you support us?[/B] Then please, put this into your signature space; [IMG]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/1739/supportp.png[/img] [CODE][CENTER]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/1739/supportp.png[/CENTER][/CODE]
Our website has been released: *
[B][U]For the haters: we don't care.[/U][/B][/CENTER]

item.title: Perplexity
item.dc:creator: @Potttt Potttt
item.description:
@Potttt wrote:

[CENTER][CENTER]Our website has been released: *

Dev. team:

Project starter;

  • Potstyle

Project co-starter;

  • Smudge

Web dev. team;

  • Smudge
  • Anthony`
  • Matt`
  • Toonshorty

Coder(s);

  • Toonshorty
  • Emperor
  • SiniSoul (Currently Away, Will return soon)
  • stacx

Other helpers/Video editors;

  • Glen`(Helper)
  • !Realize (Helper)

Revision 614

We will not be based on PKing, we will not be based on Skilling, no we’ll be based on BOTH of them!

What are we aiming for?

  • A good/stable economy.
  • Playing = fun.
  • Not accepting boredom; theres always something to do!
  • Good gameplay; you will not see 200 different types of customs on the game, we are talking about a decent RSPS not about CustomScapeSkillingPkz (I’ve made this name up, if anyone his RSPS is called like this, I’m sorry).
  • A good staff base (no abusers), which you’ll have to earn (you can’t pay for it),
  • A non-donator whore based server, donators are equal to regular players (we will treat you equally), though they’ll receive some more possibility’s ingame.
  • We will advertise on a formal way, we will not spam other servers with ‘Come join Perplexity you’ll get free pancakes’.
  • A decent website, not a regular forum.

Some screenshots, for more visit our site;

Do you support us?
Then please, put this into your signature space;

[CENTER]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/1739/supportp.png[/CENTER]

Our website has been released: *

For the haters: we don’t care.[/CENTER]
